2.    Advancing the Single Market for medicinal products

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Oriola is member of GIRP association (i.e. European Healthcare Distribution Association)
goals__remit: Oriola unites consumers and pharmaceutical companies in a unique way. Oriola provides pharmaceutical companies an effective access to markets and improves consumers' wellbeing by ensuring that pharmaceuticals, health products and services are delivered in a safe and customer-friendly manner.
